items.sentence: Tom and Mary both worked in supermarkets while they were in college.
There's nothing like the smell of freshly-mown grass in the morning.
Tom and Mary are planning to visit Australia on their next vacation.
Tom changed his plans at the last minute and went to Boston instead.
I don't think there's anyone in the world who's done what I've done.
After quite some time, I learned how to cut a pineapple into slices.
A lot of reports came to the policeman that a wild monkey was found.
Tom was a bit shorter than I was when we were in junior high school.
Tom came back home yesterday after having been gone for three years.
I'm trying to find a publisher for the book I just finished writing.
